summary: This document contains email correspondence between Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey for the week of October 8, 2013. The emails indicate that Jeffrey is hesitant to confirm the meeting until the following week.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey and communicates with Amanda Kirby about scheduling.

persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling a breakfast meeting with Jeffrey and communicates with Lesley Groff about the arrangements.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled, but his full name and role are not specified.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are discussing a meeting with an individual named Jeffrey.
The meeting is tentatively scheduled for October 8, 2013, but Jeffrey wants to wait for confirmation.
Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
